title: Advanced Quran Interpretation Course Using an Integrated Liberatory Education Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Quranic reading comprehension and introductory understanding of Islamic doctrines
context.additional_context: Co-curricular program for working professionals to strengthen social sector competencies: Asynchronous learning activities and weekly online discussion sessions in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can apply an integrated interpretive framework considering the Quranic context to exclude violent interpretations by over 90%.
Learners achieve the ability to connect Quranic interpretations with real-world social issues (validity assessment criteria: 3.5/4.0 or higher) following a liberatory education approach.
Learners can conduct peer feedback-based interpretive discussions (at least twice per session) using digital collaboration tools.

resources: Quran Original Text and Multilingual Translation Digital Library

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
